Package com.github.actionfx.core.bind

Class BindingTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.bind.BindingTarget
  • public class BindingTarget
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a desired binding between a Control and a value inside a JavaBean.
    Author:
    koster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BindingTarget​(javafx.scene.control.Control control, ControlProperties targetProperty, java.lang.Class<?> beanClass, java.lang.String beanPathExpression, java.lang.String formatPattern)
      Constructor accepting all required arguments for defining a binding target.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BindingTarget

        public BindingTarget​(javafx.scene.control.Control control,
                     ControlProperties targetProperty,
                     java.lang.Class<?> beanClass,
                     java.lang.String beanPathExpression,
                     java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Constructor accepting all required arguments for defining a binding target.
        Parameters:
        control - the control holding the value to bind
        targetProperty - the target property of the control that shall be used as binding target
        beanClass - the model bean class
        beanPathExpression - the bean path expression relative to the root been (used for nested beans inside a bean hierarchy). Expression is empty, in case the owningInstance is the rootInstance
        formatPattern - an optional format pattern that is used as constructor argument for a supplied converter.
